info.name: Codeforces GraphQL API
info.description: GraphQL API collection for Codeforces contest data from MongoDB

request.description: Get list of all Codeforces contests stored in MongoDB

graphql.query:
query GetContest($contestId: Int!) {
  contest(id: $contestId) {
    id
    name
    type
    phase
    frozen
    durationSeconds
    startTimeSeconds
    relativeTimeSeconds
    preparedBy
    websiteUrl
    description
    difficulty
    kind
    icpcRegion
    country
    city
    season
  }
}

request.description: Get contest information by ID from MongoDB
Get problem statistics for a contest
Get contest standings with pagination support
Get top 10 standings for a contest
Get contest submissions with optional count limit and handle filter
Get all submissions for a specific user in a contest
Get contest standings at a specific timestamp (simulated replay)
Get contest submissions up to a specific timestamp (simulated replay)
Get simulation state information including progress
Get all contest data in a single query (contest info, problems, standings, submissions)
